title: Dog run, Air Conditioning, Mountain, sound & skyline views
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 646 Sq.
Discover the height of luxury living at Cyrene.
Our community of high-rise apartments in downtown Seattle offers upscale one and two-bedroom floor plans featuring cutting-edge amenities and an elevated interior feel with stunning water views.

Our central location in the heart of downtown Seattle offers picturesque waterfront living and prime access to Pike Place Market, Waterfront Park, Seattle Art Museum, and plenty of exciting shopping and dining options within walking distance.
Hop on the light rail at University Street Station to get around the city in no time or stay local to explore the stunning scenery on the banks of Elliott Bay.
Schedule your tour of our Seattle high rise today to see what all the buzz is about.
- Complete Set Of Bosch Stainless-steel Appliances
- Chef's kitchen, dining tables, bar, fireplace, pool table
- Rooftop terraces with cabanas, BBQs, and fireplaces
- Three separate lounge areas equipped with TVs and coffee bar
- On-site leasing office and concierge services
Maximum 2 pets allowed in each apartment home w/ no weight restrictions.
No pet deposit, however each pet adds $50 in additional rent.
